content:
ShaderRenderMode Enum

Definition

Indicates the policy for rendering a ShaderEffect in software.

In this Article

public enum ShaderRenderMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
ShaderRenderMode

Fields

Auto

Allow hardware and software rendering.
HardwareOnly

Require hardware rendering, ignore if unavailable.
SoftwareOnly

Force software rendering.
